channel.title: Paw Paw on Vacuum weblog from Edward Vielmetti

item.title: Papaws, the Michigan banana
item.description: Paw paws go by lots of names: • Possumhaw • Dog-banana • Indian-banana • False banana • Custard-apple • Michigan banana • Hoosier banana • Ozark banana • Poor-man’s banana • Wild banana • Prairie banana • Nebraska banana • Indiana banana Zingerman's makes Paw Paw Gelato: One of the most exciting desserts this year is Paw Paw gelato. Last year I met someone who grows a large variety of Paw Paws and took my impression of them from this small wild-ish crop with limited yields to "how many do you want and what variety".
